title: cisco firepower_threat_defense 内存缓冲区边界内操作的限制不恰当
description: A vulnerability in the software-based SSL/TLS message handler of Cisco Firepower Threat Defense (FTD) Software could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to trigger a reload of an affected device, resulting in a denial of service (DoS) condition. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation of SSL/TLS messages when the device performs software-based SSL decryption. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted SSL/TLS message through an affected device. SSL/TLS messages sent to an affected device do not trigger this vulnerability. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to cause a process to crash. This crash would then trigger a reload of the device. No manual intervention is needed to recover the device after the reload.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: OpenSSL 0.9.8/1.0.0/1.0.1/1.0.2 PKCS#7 NULL Pointer Dereference 拒绝服务漏洞
description:
OpenSSL是一种开放源码的SSL实现，用来实现网络通信的高强度加密，现在被广泛地用于各种网络应用程序中。

OpenSSL的crypto/pkcs7/pk7_doit.c文件中的‘PKCS7_dataDecode’函数存在安全漏洞。远程攻击者利用该漏洞可通过畸形的PKCS#7二进制大对象（使用ASN.1编码并缺少内部EncryptedContent数据）发起拒绝服务（空指针逆向引用和应用程序崩溃）。
solution:
目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载：
https://www.openssl.org/news/secadv_20150611.txt

Android中的‘wma_stats_ext_event_handler’函数存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行任意代码或造成拒绝服务。

description:

EMC RecoverPoint for VMs 5.1.1之前的版本、EMC RecoverPoint 5.1.0.0版本和5.0.1.3之前的版本中的Admin CLI存在命令注入漏洞。攻击者可利用该漏洞绕过受限的shell，以root权限执行任意命令。

title: MediaWiki 跨站脚本攻击
description:
MediaWiki是美国维基媒体（Wikimedia）基金会和MediaWiki志愿者共同开发维护的一套自由免费的基于网络的Wiki引擎，它可用于部署内部的知识管理和内容管理系统。SemanticForms是其中的一个用来创建或编辑表单、查询数据的扩展。

MediaWiki SemanticForms扩展中存在跨站脚本漏洞，该漏洞源于Special:CreateForm页面没有充分过滤‘section_*’、‘template_*’、‘label_*’和‘new_template’参数；Special:FormEdit页面没有充分过滤‘target’和‘alt_form’参数。远程攻击者可利用该漏洞注入任意Web脚本或HTML。

title: 多款Siemens产品安全漏洞
description: A vulnerability has been identified in SIMATIC PCS 7 V8.0 and earlier (All versions), SIMATIC PCS 7 V8.1 (All versions < V8.1 with WinCC V7.3 Upd 19), SIMATIC PCS 7 V8.2 (All versions < V8.2 SP1 with WinCC V7.4 SP1 Upd 11), SIMATIC PCS 7 V9.0 (All versions < V9.0 SP2 with WinCC V7.4 SP1 Upd11), SIMATIC WinCC Professional (TIA Portal V13) (All versions), SIMATIC WinCC Professional (TIA Portal V14) (All versions < V14 SP1 Upd 9), SIMATIC WinCC Professional (TIA Portal V15) (All versions < V15.1 Upd 3), SIMATIC WinCC Runtime Professional V13 (All versions), SIMATIC WinCC Runtime Professional V14 (All versions < V14.1 Upd 8), SIMATIC WinCC Runtime Professional V15 (All versions < V15.1 Upd 3), SIMATIC WinCC V7.2 and earlier (All versions), SIMATIC WinCC V7.3 (All versions < V7.3 Upd 19), SIMATIC WinCC V7.4 (All versions < V7.4 SP1 Upd 11), SIMATIC WinCC V7.5 (All versions < V7.5 Upd 3). The SIMATIC WinCC DataMonitor web application of the affected products allows to upload arbitrary ASPX code. The security vulnerability could be exploited by an authenticated attacker with network access to the WinCC DataMonitor application. No user interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability. The vulnerability impacts confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the affected device. At the stage of publishing this security advisory no public exploitation is known.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

description: 在Linux内核5.2.9之前的fs/xfs/xfs_iops.c中的xfs_setattr_nonsize中发现了一个问题。当chgrp由于磁盘配额不足而失败时，XFS会部分楔形。xfs_qm_vop_chown_reserve调用失败后，xfs_setattr_nonsize未能解锁ILOCK。这主要是一个本地DoS攻击矢量，但是如果XFS文件系统是通过NFS导出的，那么它也可能在远程DoS中产生同样的效果。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/linux/kernel/git/torvalds/linux.git/commit/?id=1fb254aa983bf190cfd685d40c64a480a9bafaee

title: onyaktech_comments_pro_project onyaktech_comments_pro 使用硬编码的凭证
description: An issue was discovered in CommentsService.ashx in OnyakTech Comments Pro 3.8. An attacker can download a copy of the installer, decompile it, and discover a hardcoded IV used to encrypt the username and userid in the comment POST request. Additionally, the attacker can decrypt the encrypted encryption key (sent as a parameter in the comment form request) by setting this encrypted value as the username, which will appear on the comment page in its decrypted form. Using these two values (combined with the encryption functionality discovered in the decompiled installer), the attacker can encrypt another user's ID and username. These values can be used as part of the comment posting request in order to spoof the user.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: Titan SpamTitan Gateway远程代码执行漏洞
description: A sandbox escape issue was discovered in TitanHQ SpamTitan Gateway 7.07. It limits the admin user to a restricted shell, allowing execution of a small number of tools of the operating system. The restricted shell can be bypassed by presenting a fake vmware-tools ISO image to the guest virtual machine running SpamTitan Gateway. This ISO image should contain a valid Perl script at the vmware-freebsd-tools/vmware-tools-distrib/vmware-install.pl path. The fake ISO image will be mounted and the script wmware-install.pl will be executed with super-user privileges as soon as the hidden option to install VMware Tools is selected in the main menu of the restricted shell (option number 5). The contents of the script can be whatever the attacker wants, including a backdoor or similar.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

Microsoft Windows是流行的计算机操作系统。

Windows Common Log File System (CLFS)驱动程序未正确处理内存对象，在实现上存在权限提升漏洞。成功利用后可使攻击者以提升的权限运行进程。
solution:
用户可参考如下供应商提供的安全公告获得补丁信息：
https://technet.microsoft.com/library/security/MS16-134

cwe.cwe_description: 内存缓冲区边界内操作的限制不恰当

title: Subway Ordering for California本地信息泄露漏洞
description:
Subway Ordering for California (ZippyYum)是一款可用于支付的移动应用。

Subway Ordering for California应用把敏感数据不安全的存储在设备中的../Caches/com.ZippyYum.SubwayOC/目录中，加载Cache.db或Cache.db-wal可读取sqlite数据，允许恶意用户读取以明文方式存储的未加密敏感数据。
solution:
Subway Ordering for California (ZippyYum) 3.7.1已经修复该漏洞，建议用户下载更新：
http://www.zippyyum.com

solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: QEMU SCSI REPORT LUNS远程缓冲区溢出漏洞
description:

description: Nextcloud Text is a collaborative document editing application that uses Markdown. A cross-site scripting vulnerability is present in versions prior to 19.0.13, 20.0.11, and 21.0.3. The Nextcloud Text application shipped with Nextcloud server used a `text/html` Content-Type when serving files to users. Due the strict Content-Security-Policy shipped with Nextcloud, this issue is not exploitable on modern browsers supporting Content-Security-Policy. The issue was fixed in versions 19.0.13, 20.0.11, and 21.0.3. As a workaround, use a browser that has support for Content-Security-Policy.

title: ECDSA对签名的ASN.1编码进行了不正确的验证
description: 在Bouncy Castle JCE Provider版本1.55及更早版本中，ECDSA未在验证时完全验证签名的ASN.1编码。可以在构成签名的序列中注入额外的元素并且仍然对其进行验证，这在某些情况下可以允许将“不可见”数据引入到签名结构中。

基于iOS平台的Twitter Kit 3.0版本至3.4.0版本中的Login with Twitter组件存在安全漏洞，该漏洞源于回调处理程序没有验证响应的可靠性。攻击者可利用该漏洞使推特账户与第三方服务发生关联。
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: 超出范围写入drivers / vhost / net.c中的get_rx_bufs()函数
description: 在[vhost_net]驱动程序的Linux内核的handle_rx()函数中发现了一个缺陷。在特定条件下，malicious virtual guest可以触发虚拟主机上的kmalloc-8 slab中的越界写入，这可能导致内核内存损坏和系统混乱。由于缺陷的性质，不能完全排除特权升级。 v4.16及更新版本的版本容易受到攻击。

title: unrar 缓冲区溢出代码执行漏洞

如果用户受骗打开了恶意压缩文档的话，就可能触发这个漏洞，导致执行任意代码。但如果要利用这个漏洞，必须要求用户与程序交互，用户在响应了要求密码提示后输入密码才可以触发这个漏洞。

title: reddit snudown 输入验证不恰当
description: Snudown is a reddit-specific fork of the Sundown Markdown parser used by GitHub, with Python integration added. In affected versions snudown was found to be vulnerable to denial of service attacks to its reference table implementation. References written in markdown ` [reference_name]: https://www.example.com` are inserted into a hash table which was found to have a weak hash function, meaning that an attacker can reliably generate a large number of collisions for it. This makes the hash table vulnerable to a hash-collision DoS attack, a type of algorithmic complexity attack. Further the hash table allowed for duplicate entries resulting in long retrieval times. Proofs of concept and further discussion of the hash collision issue are discussed on the snudown GHSA(https://github.com/reddit/snudown/security/advisories/GHSA-6gvv-9q92-w5f6). Users are advised to update to version 1.7.0.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。
